alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Grand Forks, southeastern Nelson, western Traill, eastern Griggs and Steele Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aneta, or 43 miles west of Grand Forks, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cooperstown, Northwood, Hatton, Golden Lake, Finley, McVille and Aneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Grand Forks.

area.areaDesc: Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele; Traill
